65395.summary: Some customers in the Henderson Estates area of Edmonton are experiencing an interruption to Internet, Television and Home Phone services. We are working to restore service as quickly as possible and apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.
65395.title: Aug 11 - Edmonton (Henderson Estates) | All Services - Outage (Fix In Progress)
